summary: Lets you disenchant any item and learn the enchantment. Works with ALL items that aren't from another mod. Supports Dragonborn and Dawnguard!
descriptionHtml:
Basically just removes the restriction on rare or/and unique items, that makes it unable to be disenchanted. Every existing item in the vanilla game has been covered, but it might not work with modded armors/weapons which has the restriction. However i might enable some in the future if i get permission.

Small and easy to use. Doesn't require anything else than the original game itself.
Every item in the vanilla game is covered.

[b]HIGHLY[/b] recommend using it withÂ [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40425/]No Enchantment Restrictions

[/url]
[u]Please do not re-upload this anyways without my permission.[/u]
author: Effie
